Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Enums
  • Methods
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.AudioOptions
    Use IncomingAudioOptions and OutgoingAudioOptions instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.LocalVideoStreamsUpdatedEvent
    Use VideoStreamStateChangedEventArgs instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.RemoteVideoStreamsEvent
    Use VideoStreamStateChangedEventArgs instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.VideoOptions
    Use getIncomingVideoOptions() and getOutgoingVideoOptions() instead
  • Enums 
    Enum Description
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.MediaStreamType
    Use VideoStreamSourceType instead
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.AcceptCallOptions.getVideoOptions()
    Use getIncomingVideoOptions() and getOutgoingVideoOptions() instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.AcceptCallOptions.setVideoOptions​(VideoOptions)
    Use getIncomingVideoOptions() and getOutgoingVideoOptions() instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.AudioOptions.isMuted()
    Deprecated use muted property in OutgoingAudioOptions instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.AudioOptions.setMuted​(boolean)
    Deprecated use muted property in OutgoingAudioOptions instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.Call.addOnIsMutedChangedListener​(PropertyChangedListener)
    Use OnOutgoingAudioStateChanged listener instead. isMutedChanged Event. Occurs when the call is muted
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.Call.addOnLocalVideoStreamsUpdatedListener​(LocalVideoStreamsUpdatedListener)
    Use onStateChanged in the VideoStream instead LocalVideoStreamsUpdated Event. Occurs when Local video streams are added to or removed from a call
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.Call.getLocalVideoStreams()
    Use getOutgoingVideoStreams instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.Call.isMuted()
    Use isOutgoingAudioMuted instead.
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.Call.removeOnIsMutedChangedListener​(PropertyChangedListener)
    Use OnOutgoingAudioStateChanged listener instead. isMutedChanged Event. Occurs when the call is muted
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.Call.removeOnLocalVideoStreamsUpdatedListener​(LocalVideoStreamsUpdatedListener)
    Use onStateChanged in the VideoStream instead LocalVideoStreamsUpdated Event. Occurs when Local video streams are added to or removed from a call
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.CallVideoStream.getMediaStreamType()
    Use SourceType instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.CommonCall.mute​(Context)
    Use muteOutgoingAudio instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.CommonCall.unmute​(Context)
    Use unMuteOutgoingAudio instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.JoinCallOptions.getAudioOptions()
    Use getIncomingAudioOptions() and getOutgoingAudioOptions() instead.
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.JoinCallOptions.getVideoOptions()
    Use getIncomingVideoOptions() and getOutgoingVideoOptions() instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.JoinCallOptions.setAudioOptions​(AudioOptions)
    Use getIncomingAudioOptions() and getOutgoingAudioOptions() instead.
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.JoinCallOptions.setVideoOptions​(VideoOptions)
    Use getIncomingVideoOptions() and getOutgoingVideoOptions() instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.LocalVideoStream.isSending()
    Use RemoteVideoStream.getState() instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.RemoteParticipant.addOnVideoStreamsUpdatedListener​(RemoteVideoStreamsUpdatedListener)
    Use OnVideoStreamStateChanged instead RemoteVideoStreamsUpdated Event. Occurs when remote video streams are added or removed
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.RemoteParticipant.getVideoStreams()
    Use getIncomingVideoStreams instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.RemoteParticipant.removeOnVideoStreamsUpdatedListener​(RemoteVideoStreamsUpdatedListener)
    Use OnVideoStreamStateChanged instead RemoteVideoStreamsUpdated Event. Occurs when remote video streams are added or removed
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.RemoteVideoStream.isAvailable()
    Use RemoteVideoStream.getState() instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.StartCallOptions.getAudioOptions()
    Use getIncomingAudioOptions() and getOutgoingAudioOptions() instead.
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.StartCallOptions.getVideoOptions()
    Use getIncomingVideoOptions() and getOutgoingVideoOptions() instead
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.StartCallOptions.setAudioOptions​(AudioOptions)
    Use getIncomingAudioOptions() and getOutgoingAudioOptions() instead.
    com.azure.android.communication.calling.StartCallOptions.setVideoOptions​(VideoOptions)
    Use getIncomingVideoOptions() and getOutgoingVideoOptions() instead
